response.overview: For almost five decades, Yello have shaped the development of electronic pop music, which Dieter Meier (vocals) and Boris Blank (keyboards, sampling) left their mark on from the late 1970s onwards with cult hits like "Bostich," "Oh Yeah," and "The Race." With their collage-like signature mix of synthetic beats, organic soundbites, and associative wordplay, the Swiss band continually experiment with new ideas, while categorically rejecting all genre categories with a noncommittal smile to this day.
response.title: Yello - Yello Touch
